methods.Synopsis: Retrieve a filtered, paged list of content resources

parameters.Name: instance
parameters.Description: Your Kapost instance id or subdomain, ex 'mashable'

parameters.Name: detail
parameters.Description: The level of detail in the response for each record

parameters.Name: page
parameters.Description: The (1-indexed) page number to retrieve.

parameters.Name: per_page
parameters.Description: The number of entries to retrieve per page.

parameters.Name: user_id
parameters.Description: Content filtered for a specified user. Accepts both object ids and slugs, ex. '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d' or 'john-6'

parameters.Name: campaign_id
parameters.Description: Content filtered for a specified campaign. Accepts both object ids and slugs, ex. '51f05bc04aaaae4ae80000d' or 'awesome-video-campaign-1'

parameters.Name: category
parameters.Description: Filter content using the specified category name(s)

parameters.Name: include_empty_categories
parameters.Description: Relevant only if filtering by category

parameters.Name: date_type
parameters.Description: Filter content using the specified date field

parameters.Name: start
parameters.Description:
Relevant only if filtering by date. Content greater or equal to this timestamp will be returned.

Beta Warning: The format for this field will soon change to ISO 8601.

parameters.Name: end
parameters.Description:
Relevant only if filtering by date. Content less than or equal to this timestamp will be returned.

Beta Warning: The format for this field will soon change to ISO 8601.

parameters.Name: listener_id
parameters.Description: Filter content by listener (user) id. Accepts both object ids and slugs, ex. '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d' or 'samantha-james-2'

parameters.Name: content_type_id
parameters.Description: Filter content by content type id. Accepts an object id only.

parameters.Name: search
parameters.Description: Filter content by search phrase

parameters.Name: content_number
parameters.Description: Filter content by content number

parameters.Name: state
parameters.Description: Filter content by content state

parameters.Name: instance
parameters.Description: Your Kapost instance id or subdomain, ex 'mashable'

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: Content id or slug, ex 'welcome-to-kapost' or '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d'

parameters.Name: privacy

EnumeratedDescription.private: Only invited users may see this content (See invitee_ids below)
EnumeratedDescription.members: Any member of your instance may see this content

parameters.Description: Select the privacy setting for this content

parameters.Name: invitee_ids
parameters.Description: Array of invited user object ids or username slugs, relevant only if a content privacy is set to private and not yet in production

parameters.Name: is_draft
parameters.Description: Whether or not this content is in draft state

parameters.Name: campaign_ids
parameters.Description: Array of campaign object ids or slugs associated with this content

parameters.Name: submission_deadline
parameters.Description:
Unix timestamp (in milliseconds, ex '1376092036000')

Beta Warning: The format for this field will soon change to ISO 8601.

parameters.Name: publish_deadline
parameters.Description:
Unix timestamp (in milliseconds, ex '1376092036000')

Beta Warning: The format for this field will soon change to ISO 8601.

parameters.Name: payment_type

EnumeratedDescription.user: Uses the author's rate for the payment amount.
EnumeratedDescription.fixed: Uses a fixed rate for the payment amount.

parameters.Description: Use a payment for this post, and select a payment strategy

parameters.Name: payment_fixed_rate
parameters.Description: Relevent when using a fixed rate for the payment amount for this post.

parameters.Name: tags
parameters.Description: A string containing a comma-separated list of tags

parameters.Name: external_file_url
parameters.Description: Certain types of posts, such as google drive documents require an external URL reference

parameters.Name: persona_ids
parameters.Description: If using personas and buying stages, an array of object id's of personas targeted by this content.

parameters.Name: stage_ids
parameters.Description: If using personas and buying stages, an array of object id's of buying stages targeted by this content.
